name: Robot Busters
description:
Robot Busters is a simplistic top down shooter rogue-lite made using Scratch (more specifically the extension Turbowarp) for the Itching-to-Scratch game jam hosted by the Creator's Campfire Discord server. I am also currently working on a YouTube video about how I made the game on my channel Sterling Gamer: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4bIasPbGc0WAjCOCPiTgMw

CONTROLLS:

WASD to move around the map, aim with your mouse pointer, left click to fire your gun, space to slide/dodgeroll, and E to slow down time.

WARNING!!!!!!

There is a massive game breaking bug in the game. I tried for a few hours to fix it to no avail. Sometimes when loading  a level, you will lose the ability to shoot and only a single "ranger" enemy will spawn. To fix this problem, reload the project with the green flag at the top and select "story mode". This will put you back at the point you were before with all of your upgrades.
